participant_1.name: Ryan
participant_1.personality: Social and outgoing, enjoys meeting new people and sharing experiences.
participant_1.background: my favourite food is shawarma. i am in the army. i live in canada. i did not graduate high school. my grandfather served in world war a.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Creative and a bit quirky, enjoys music and gaming, with a passion for roleplaying.
participant_2.background: my favorite band is the insane clown posse. i play a lot of call of duty. i drive a ford pinto. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events.

content.text:
I am little bit shy☺️ 
Tell me about yourself!
I am a retired military. Are you in the army?
